title: Smartphone Durability Awards 2018!
description: Its time for the Smartphone Durability, and repairability, awards of 2018. There were so many cool phones released this year. From dual screens, to motorized cameras... But which phones can we trust to be the most durable? Its time for the JerryRigEverything Smartphone Durability test year end review. Spoilers and video links below!
